body.name: K&F Concept 64 inch/163cm Camera Tripod,Lightweight Travel Outdoor DSLR Tripods with 360 Degree Ball Head Load Capacity 8kg/17.6lbs,Cellphone Clip for Smartphone Live Streaming Vlog K234A0+BH-28L
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Lightweight and Portable】4 section leg can adjust tripod height from 20.4''/52cm to 64.1''/163cm; it can be folded to 15.3''/39cm to make it easy to put it in the carrying bag; the net weight with the ball head included is only 2.53lbs/1.15 KG.

【360 Degree Metal Ball Head】28mm metal ball head can be rotated to any angle you want, helping to improve the range of camera activity during panning.The 360-degree panning dial lets you set up precision shots to capture the beauty of landscapes.

【Efficient and Flexible】With powerful and quick flip leg lock, only use one hand can open and close all the buttons in a few seconds. It's very easy to use, saving you more time and can more focused on enjoying the shooting.
【Versatile Ability】The center column inverted installation (also with a short center column) to achieve the lowest angling shooting, archery and special photography.

【More Compatibility】This camera tripod with standard 1/4 inch thread,which can be applied to most Arca-Swiss quick release plates; 1/4" screw is suitable for most cameras, DSLR camera, projector and telescope, etc.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 892 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1.How to choose the height of the tripod? Choose a tripod that is suitable for your height. Tripod height=your height-15cm-camera height. If you have additional requirements, you can choose according to the actual situation. 2.What is the difference between carbon fiber tripod and aluminum tripod? For the same size tripod,carbon fiber will weigh about 30% less than aluminum alloy, and its strength will be higher, and it will not rust. But the value is also higher. 3.How to choose the tripod loading capacity? You can choose according to the weight of camera and lens, for example your equipment is 2kg, it is suggested to choose the tripod bearing above 4kg. 4.What is the difference between the twist lock and the lever lock? The structure of the twist lock is simple, easy to replace parts, disassemble, clean and maintain. The lever lock opens faster and is easy to operate with one hand. Can other gimbal be installed? Yes, any gimbal with a 3/8-inch port on the bottom is compatible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome tripod for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Don’t waste your time or money with cheaper alternatives. This tripod is great! Super sturdy with the extending legs and locks. Easy to assemble and fold up for putting away. Great deal on this tripod. Look no further! Yes it comes with a phone clamp which was a breeze to install. A+++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is not my first Tripod, but previously I paid MORE for an vastly inferior one. This is excellent! The fold up size is very small, the expanded size is as big as anyone needs. The quality of every component the final assembly is great. Powder coated at this price? Unbelievable! You can get lighter, but only if you go carbon fiber. and it looks kind of cool! There is nothing more you can want for a tripod well under $90

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid tripod, good value, a couple of flaws
reviews.reviewText: Overall very pleased with this tripod. Pretty easy to use once you get the hang of what all the knobs and levers do. Minor gripes which knock it down to 4 stars for me:1) In the product I received, the hex/allen head bolts which secure the legs to the center of the tripod had a bunch of tiny extremely sharp burrs on them. I kept getting little slices cut into my hands the first couple times I used the tripod, and it took me a while to figure out the source. I used a Dremel tool to clean up the surface of those bolt heads, and all is good now. But buyers should be aware of this hazard.2) The bubble level on the tripod head is fairly useless. It is heavily biased toward the center. So as long as you're within 5-10º or so of horizontal, it reads as if you are actually level. I was hoping I'd be able to use the level to quickly get set up on uneven terrain, but it really isn't helpful.Aside from those two issues, I've found the tripod to be quite secure and useful so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BETTER THAN EXPECTED
reviews.reviewText: This is sturdy enough to support a heavy telescope. Wasn’t sure but it did it. Sturdier than expected and east to work with. Lightweight and simple setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, inexpensive and upgradable
reviews.reviewText: I don't use a tripod very often, so can't justify investing in an expensive one, but I did already have a good quality ball head. I found that tripods that don't already come with ball-heads are high-end and cost more than I was looking to spend and most of the inexpensive tripods come with heads that either aren't removable or used non-standard connections. The head on this tripod is removable and uses a standard 3/8" threaded head mount, so I was able to easily swap heads. There is also a fairly flimsy feeling plastic weight clip on the bottom of the tripod, but it turns out that also uses a standard 3/8" thread that is easy to swap with a sturdier spring-loaded metal option (plenty of choices available on Amazon). I think the out-of-the box components will meet most people's needs just fine, but hopefully it's helpful to know that you are able to swap parts out if you find you want to make some upgrades in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Overall Tripod for Daily Use
reviews.reviewText: I love this new tripod. I find the build quality to be great, weight is just right -- not too heavy and not too light, and it is easy to set up and take down. I think the value for the price is spot on too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional and compact tripod
reviews.reviewText: It took me a bit to get oriented to how to use this tripod as it works a little differently to the usual "standard" tripods I've had in the past, especially in regard to unfolding the legs. The design allows it to fold up really compact for how tall of a tripod it is and it feels solid. My only complaint is that there is no quick release function to snap the camera into the tripod, you have to manually screw and unscrew the quick attach bracket on the bottom of the camera in and out of the tripod to take it on and off. I wish it just had the usual lever to lock it in and out of the tripod, but otherwise it's a great tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice tripod at a good price
reviews.reviewText: Very good tripod for the price and it folds down to about 16 inches. Very easy to transport.
My second tripod, far superior quality to my previous one. Easy to use, love the adjustability.
Beste Qualität, nicht nur in der Preis Kategorie sondern bis zum 200 Euro.Drehen ist so reibungslos, man kann Filme damit machen.Robuster Build, leicht zu bedienen.Gerne empfehlen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the price this is really excellent quality, can recommend!

This is my second time ordering a KF Concept tripod in the past year. They are both great. I ordered a second on because I need it to replace another broken one. It's nice and compact but just a bit heavier than my old one. Looking forward to using it on our upcoming Hawaiian cruise.
Super verarbeitet, lässt sich wirklich vielseitig verwenden! Einfach klasse!
